titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for an exception to the history and government knowledge requirement for naturalization.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 1/20/1993--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to waive the government knowledge naturalization requirement for persons over age 60 who have resided in the United States as permanent residents for at least 20 years.
